channel.title: Search Engine on uweb browser: unlimited power
channel.description: Recent content in Search Engine on uweb browser: unlimited power

item.title: Search engine files
item.description: Any ".search" file can be opened as search engine file, each line of which has one of the following formats: [Engine name]:[url without '%s' inside] [Engine name]:[url with '%s' as keyword] [Engine name]:POST:[post params with '%s' as keyword]:[url] [Engine name]:[Extra request headers]:[post params with '%s' as keyword]:[url] [Extra request headers] Ex. "X-Forwarded-For;8.8.8.8" when [post params] is empty, the url should have '%s' as keyword. Ex. bingUS engine w/ chatgpt Limitations (they are here for performance reasons):
